scripts.build: ngzip scripts.js > ../data/scripts.js.gz & ngzip style.css > ../data/style.css.gz & html-minifier index.htm --output ../data/index.htm --collapse-whitespace & html-minifier distillation.htm --output ../data/distillation.htm --collapse-whitespace & html-minifier reflux.htm --output ../data/reflux.htm --collapse-whitespace & html-minifier brewing.htm --output ../data/brewing.htm --collapse-whitespace & html-minifier heater.htm --output ../data/heater.htm --collapse-whitespace
